sub init {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->{dataName} = 'reduction';
  $self->{name} = 'reduction';
  $self->{Name} = 'Reduction';
  $self->{namePattern} = qr/\S+/;

# Number of lines of code in noreduce: 6
sub noreduce {
  my $self = shift;
  my %flags;
  foreach my $id (@_) {$flags{$id} = 0}
  $self->set(%flags);
}

public method Parser::Context::Reduction::reduce (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in reduce: 6
sub reduce {
  my $self = shift;
  my %flags;
  foreach my $id (@_) {$flags{$id} = 1}
  $self->set(%flags);
}
